specialRules.title: Shield Disruptor
description: A weapon with Shield Disruptor ignores Ion Shields. In addition, each hit with will knock down two Powerfields, Shadowfields or Void Shields. When only one field/shield remains, a Shield Disruptor hit will knock it down and must then be saved as a normal hit (it loses TK, MW or Lance).

unit.name: Slavebringer Assault Boat
specialRules: Transport (May carry up to eight infantry units).
Critical Hit Effect: The Slavebringer and all on board are destroyed.

unit.name: Executioner Assault Ship
specialRules: Transport: may carry up to twelve infantry units.
Critical Hit Effect: The Exercutioner crashes to the ground and is destroyed along with all on board.

unit.name: Torture Class Cruiser
specialRules: Transport (may carry up to one Executioner Assault Ship and two Slavebringer Assault Boats; or up to four Slavebringer Assault Boats, plus the troops carried in them.
